long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview
IG Follower Export Tool - IG Tools can export IG followers and followings to Excel/CSV formats with one click.

With the help of the extension, Ins Tools - Ins Follower Export Tool, you can scrape over 50K IG followers or followings with a single click.

How to Use
Click the Ins Tools - Ins Follower Export Tool icon on the browser toolbar to open the IGTools popup page via IGTools Net.
Click the "Export IG Data" button to open an IGTools option page.
Input a valid IG profile URL or IG ID.
Click the "Start parsing" button, and our IG Tools will run automatically. Once the process is complete, you can download IG followers or followings to CSV or Excel.
Features
Export IG followers and followings with one click using the extension.
Export up to 50K IG followers or followings.
Supports CSV and Excel formats.
Handles IG rate limit errors.
Process data with one click via IGTools net.
Supported Columns
ID
User Name
Full Name
IG Profile URL
IG Avatar URL
Is IG Profile verified
Security
The extension does not ask for your IG password or any personal data, including IG user information, story, visit history, posts, and social relationships.
IG enforces a rate limit, i.e., a limit on the number of requests. The rate limit is not public information and varies depending on your IP address.
How it works in IG Follower Export Tool
If you export a large list of IG followers, you might encounter a rate limit error.
The extension will enter “Cooldown” mode, and a timer will show the remaining time.
If the rate limit error persists, the cooldown period will double.
Once the cooldown period ends and the subsequent request is successful, the IGTools will switch back to Normal mode.
